name: dome-fossil
effect: Give to a scientist in the mining museum in oreburgh city or the Museum of Science in pewter city to receive a kabuto.
short_effect: Can be revived into a Kabuto.

flavor_text.emerald: A piece of an ancient marine POKéMON’s shell.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A fossil of an ancient, seafloor- dwelling POKéMON. It appears to be part of a shell.
